advisory.name: RLBA-2022:2139
advisory.synopsis: tlog bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for tlog is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description:
Tlog is a terminal I/O recording program similar to "script", but used in place of a user's shell, starting the recording and executing the real user's
shell afterwards. The recorded I/O can then be forwarded to a logging server
in JSON format.

fixes.description: tlog causing SSH to not reliably run commands [rhel-8.6.0.z]
